name: Ultra Zultra
summary:
It's Pixel Platforming time!
Can you handle tough sweet procedurally generated levels?
Will you master the super tight controls?
If you ever reach the Peak Society Boss, will you defeat him and save HUMANITY?!?!
Find out only by playing Ultra Zultra.... TODAY!
Not convinced? We got tons of power ups and items that will
make your attempts less frustrating!
